data.title: Sydney and Bondi Backpacker Tour
data.meta_description: Looking for the Ultimate Sydney intro week down under? This Sydney group tour will uncover all the highlights. Cruise the Harbour, Surf at Bondi and more.
data.text:
This Ultimate Sydney and Beaches group tour is a week long welcome tour to kick start your adventure down under. The tour is ideal for Solo travellers, couples and groups aged 18 - 35 years old. The itinerary has been designed to help participants tick off the bucket list sights of Sydney whilst meeting new friends from all around the world.

The Ultimate Sydney and Beaches group tour starts on most Mondays throughout the year and offers plenty of activities and chill time.

Whilst this Ultimate Sydney and Beaches group tour is jam-packed with awesome activities, you may choose to add our optional activities to your booking. The last day of the Ultimate Sydney itinerary is a free day where no activities are scheduled. Sydney has endless adventures and activities available to top off your week!

Sydney Bridge Climb, Taronga Zoo and Port Stephens are our customers favourite optional activities. You can pre-book these optional activities guaranteeing availability on your chosen departure date or organise any additional activities as you travel. Check out some of our popular optional extras and simply add them to your booking at checkout.

ARRIVING INTO SYDNEY EARLIER?

The Ultimate Sydney and Beaches group tour starts in Sydney on Mondays. This means your first nights accommodation is on Monday night. If you are planning to arrive earlier into Sydney, you can choose to book additional nights when processing your booking online. Extra nights are booked at Sydney's Number 1 Hostel, WakeUp! The East Coast tour departs from WakeUp Hostel, Sydney.

EAST COAST AUSTRALIA

After spending a week with us in Sydney, most customers will continue to Aussie adventure with a trip up the East Coast. Check out our guided East Coast tours here.

Want to explore another part of Australia or keen for an activity we haven't mentioned? Let us know! We're the Aussie travel experts and are here to help you plan your dream adventure Down Under!

To book this Ultimate Sydney and Beaches tour, select your chosen departure date and any optional extras you would like to book. We'll send you a booking confirmation as well as important information about your tour.

If you have a travel date in mind but you're not ready to pay in full, you can secure your spot with a $300 deposit.

Book your flights into Sydney (not included)

Organise your travel insurance (not included)

When booking, let us know if you would like to book the set itinerary or leave your arrangements 'Open-dated'

If you have any questions regarding your arrangements, visit our Tour FAQ's or contact us below.

TOUR INFORMATION

Tour starts at Wakeup Hostel in Sydney at 11.30am on Mondays or Thursdays (Depending on your booking date)

Guided activities end on Saturday evening.

There are no arrangements scheduled on the itinerary for Sunday.

Accommodation is booked for a consecutive seven nights. Hostel Checkout will be the following Monday.

Whilst this Ultimate Sydney and Beaches group tour is jam-packed with awesome activities, you may choose to add our optional activities to your booking. The last day of the Ultimate Sydney itinerary is a free day where no activities are scheduled. Sydney has endless adventures and activities available to top off your week!

Organise your travel insurance (not included)

If you have any questions regarding your arrangements, visit our Tour FAQ's or contact us below.

TOUR INFORMATION

Tour starts at Wakeup Hostel in Sydney at 11.30am on Mondays

Guided activities end on Saturday evening.

There are no arrangements scheduled on the itinerary for Sunday.

Accommodation is booked for a consecutive seven nights. Hostel Checkout will be the following Monday.

BOOK NOW

DAY 1 WELCOME TO SYDNEY

Welcome to Australia! We’ll organise your airport shuttle to take you directly to your accommodation so you don’t have to worry about a thing. Settle into your hostel and get ready for a week of fun on Ultimate Sydney and Bondi! Today you’ll join us at ULTIMATE HQ where you’ll receive a fun orientation before joining our guided city walk with your group – the perfect way to kick off your time in Oz! Explore the Botanical Gardens, eat fish and chips in Darling Harbour and get a selfie in front of Sydney Opera House! Tonight we visit our favourite party bar for our welcome dinner.

DAY 3 BONDI BEACH

Today we visit the famous Bondi Beach! In the morning we travel to Coogee before taking in the sites along the coast via the local and famous ‘Coogee to Bondi’ coastal walk! After stopping at all the local beaches and taking in the views, we will arrive to the renowned Bondi where we can explore the Graffiti walls or simply chill on Australia’s most famous beach! Bring your swimmers, comfy shoes & some money for a few drinks. The afternoon is at your leisure. We will return to Sydney late in the day via train.

DAY 7 SYDNEY AND BEYOND

Today is yours to explore Sydney on your own or with your new travel mates. The possible adventures are endless and your guide will be available to help provide you with suggestions and to let you know ‘What’s On’ in Sydney. The Ultimate Sydney and Bondi tour has come to an end, but our team are available to provide ongoing travel support and advice whilst you are in Australia.

We don't think so! Our tour definitely includes social aspects and will introduce you to plenty of other travellers, but is not 'party' orientated.

We spend the majority of our week getting to know the city and enjoying everything it has to offer. Our one official 'Night Out' in on Saturday where we get together one last time to experience the famous Sydney weekend nightlife!

On our Group Tours, your transport and accommodation along with the meals and activities listed on the itinerary are all included in your tour price. While you are travelling you may wish to participate in additional activities which you will need to budget for. While travelling you may wish to eat and drink out or you may plan to cook and prepare some of your own meals.

As a guide, we recommend you budget an additional $80 - $100AUD per day for spending money. Please note that all travellers are different and you may wish to travel with additional spending money. There are amazing optional activities and food options on offer on the East Coast and if you desire to experience most of them, you may wish to budget for additional spending money.
